operation.descriptionCdata:
2e4c4d6e-c9f8-4018-980b-d186525438a5.description=
Checks for anomolies in the output of IOStat. There should be two readings, the average since bootup, and the current.


Input Parameters\:
data - the raw output of the Get Extended IO Information operation.

Returns\:
A summary of the IO information.

Responses\:
success - output successfully checked.
operation.name: Check IO information

scriptlet.name: Operation Check IO information (dafafeb5-ffe3-4996-a192-84fcdea08c50)
